statements: TRUNCATE TABLE disaster_area, relief_operations, financial_transactions, expenses RESTART IDENTITY;
TRUNCATE TABLE relief_operations RESTART IDENTITY CASCADE;
TRUNCATE TABLE financial_transactions, expenses, disaster_operations, operation_expenses, transaction_categories;
TRUNCATE TABLE expenses; TRUNCATE TABLE disaster_operations; TRUNCATE TABLE operation_expenses; TRUNCATE TABLE financial_transactions; TRUNCATE TABLE transaction_categories;
